name: T - Layla
_source: multi_add_portrait;Layla;Left;Emma;Right
speak;Emma; Hey Layla, what are you up to?
speak;Layla; Oh, hey Emma!{w} I am reading a book about the dark arts!{w} As a fellow magic scholar, I'm sure you'll appreciate it.
bop_portrait;Layla
speak;Layla; I've been doing some pretty heavy research about the process of reanimating corpses.
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; Wh-why would you want to know that?

speak;Layla; It's been an interest of mine for a while,{w} but this time Lily asked me to research it.{w} I want to figure out what causes them to move,{w} and Lily wants to know how to nullify the spell.
speak;Emma; And you think that's a good idea?{w} Aren' you a little young to be looking into the art of necromancy?
speak;Layla; I'm only- I mean, already 14, Emma.{w} That is practically an adult.{w} This is all I want to learn about.{w} It's all I'm interested in{tgm}...{tgm}{w} This, and my art.
speak;Emma; Oh, so you can draw as well?
speak;Emma; I think art school has a lower likelihood of accidentally evoking the apocalypse.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Layla;Yes, I can.
bop_portrait;Layla
speak;Layla; I have to draw a lot of runes and diagrams in my notebooks,{w} and they're nothing that impressive,{w} but{tgm}...
move_portrait;Layla;MidRight
speak;Layla; Here, this is what I was drawing just before the bandits attacked.
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; This is actually a good drawing, Layla.{w} You've got a real talent for this!
speak;Layla; Yes, as opposed to fake talent.
move_portrait;Layla;Left
speak;Layla; Listen, I appreciate it, but I've got to get back to my research.{w} I'll talk to you later.
speak;Emma; Alright, but don't stay up all night with your head buried in a book, please.
speak;Layla; Yeah, yeah, I won't.
multi_remove_portrait;Emma;Layla
remove_talk;Emma;Layla
